frontmatter.title: Casting a pointer to UInt in Swift
frontmatter.mdxPreview: There are some times in Swift, like when using [System Trace](https://developer.apple.com/videos/play/wwdc2016/411/), that you want to get the pointer value of an object directly as a `UInt` (passing the pointer to `kdebug_signpost` is one).
